name: 1024 -The Little Brother of 2048, Free Puzzle Game
name_original: 1024 -The Little Brother of 2048, Free Puzzle Game
description:
Have you played 2048? This game will rock your world, especially if you like puzzle and board games!

It's a best way to kill time or get some rest from a long day!

1024 the simpler version of 2048 with MORE exciting updates! You can now cheat and UPGRADE tiles even if the numbers do not match. If you fail to get to number 1024, no worries, you can remove tiles when the game is over with "Stargate."

The gameplay is simple. Join the numbers until you get 1024. Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

Challenge friends on Facebook to beat your score!

Download now, it's FREE!
